product.name: Dog Car Ramp for Large Dogs, Foldable Dog Steps Aluminum Dog Ramps, Dog Stairs with Nonslip Surface for High Beds, Trucks, Cars and SUV, Supports up to 240 lbs (67'' L x 17'' W)
product.bullet_points:
• 【Anti-Slip & High-Traction Surface】- The walking surface of dog car ramp is covered with high-quality non-slip textured tread for better grip, which prevents your pet from slipping or shaking while your large dogs get into or out a car, truck or SUV. While waterproof surface is easy to clean the dirt after outdoor use.
• 【Safety & High Stability】- High grade aluminum ensures the dog ramp stairs more lightweight and durable at the same time, strong enough to support dogs up to 240lbs, but just weighs 1 lbs. 2 upper and 2 lower anti-skid buckles keep the dog steps stable without shaking. While the sturdy safety tether keep dog vehicle ramp in place that provides additional protection.
• 【Great Partner for Pets】- 67’’ L dog ramps for car offer a gentle angle for your pets to walk up or down from the car, SUV, truck, or other high places, which reduces muscle soreness and joint tension caused by jumping in your pet and relieves stress on paws and joints. Suitable for small, medium, large dogs, injured dogs or old dogs.
• 【Foldable &Easy To Carry】- The large dog ramp step can be effortlessly folded into four-fold, and the folded dimensions are 17.3”*17.3”*5.1”, let you conveniently store it in vehicle or under your bed or sofa without taking up much space. The built-in handle design makes the lightweight pet ramp stairs convenient to carry out.
• 【Multifunctional Dog Car Ramp】- The pet steps for large dogs can be folded into a compact size for indoor and outdoor use. While pets do not need to jump, or be lifted and lowered, it helps your furry friends more comfortably and safely to get into car, SUV, truck, minivan, RV, couch, high bed and porch steps on their own. It provides a great solution to help pets cross a variety of obstacles.
